meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable of being extruded.
meanings.sent1: The extrudabilities of the clay made it easy to shape into different forms.
meanings.sent2: The plastic's extrudabilities allowed it to be molded into various shapes.
meanings.sent3: The extrudabilities of the playdough made it a favorite among children for creating fun shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had extrudabilities that seemed to flow endlessly, like a never-ending stream of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The extrudabilities of the pasta machine made it simple to create different noodle shapes.

meanings.sent1: The extrudabilities of the material made it perfect for 3D printing.
meanings.sent2: The extrudabilities of the dough allowed it to be pushed through the cookie press easily.
meanings.sent3: The extrudabilities of the toothpaste tube seemed to surprise the child as it squeezed out in a long line.
meanings.sent4: His extrudabilities in coming up with new ideas were unmatched in the team.
meanings.sent5: The extrudabilities of the machine made the production process much more efficient.
